dental_plane_desc: The dental plan, using the credit system, allows you to receive dental treatment and cosmetic services without the need for upfront payment. By obtaining credit through the Bajet platform in cooperation with Tejarat Bank, you can pay your treatment costs in installments over flexible time periods. This service helps you remove financial concerns from essential or cosmetic dental treatments and focus peacefully on your oral and dental health.
loan: Get a loan right now! In exclusive collaboration with Tejarat Bank
bnpl: What is the credit system and BNPL, and how does it work?
bnpl_desc: The BNPL (Buy Now, Pay Later) credit system is a modern financial solution that enables you to use desired products and services without paying upfront, allowing you to pay later. First, you apply for credit through the Bajet platform, then you can use this credit in active service plans such as dental treatment, travel, auto parts, and insurance services. Credit repayment is done in installments according to the defined conditions.
register_credit: How can I register to receive credit, and what steps are involved?
register_credit_des: To learn how to register and receive credit, click on this <1>link</1>.
obtaining_credit: What are the credit evaluation conditions?
obtaining_credit_desc: During the credit evaluation stage, the applicant's financial and banking behavior, including debts, loan installments, returned checks, etc., is reviewed. As a result, the individual's credit score is determined, forming the basis for continuing the loan process in the banking system.
credit_repayment_desc: After completing the required steps and obtaining the dental loan from Tejarat Bank, you can repay the installments through the regular repayment methods of Tejarat Bank. The three repayment methods are:
option_one: Direct deposit to the bank account
option_two: Payment via Tejarat Mobile Banking and Internet Banking
requirements_receiving_credit: Which plans are currently covered by this service?
requirements_receiving_credit_desc: All dental services provided by Dentallit-approved providers.
repayment: Is using this service only possible through Tejarat Bank?
repayment_desc: Currently, yes. However, if another bank joins this project, updates will be announced on this page.
covered_service: Is it possible to increase or extend the credit?
covered_service_desc: Actions will be carried out based on the guidelines of the lending bank.
service_through_tejarat_desc: All provinces based on the list of Dentallit providers approved by the Iranian Dental Association.
increase_extend_credit: What is the interest rate for dental installment payments?
increase_extend_credit_desc: You can calculate your installment interest using the calculator available on the homepage.
wallet: Can the balance in the Dentallit wallet be withdrawn as cash?
wallet_desc: No. It can only be used for dental services with dentists approved by the Iranian Dental Association.
wallet_balance: Can the wallet balance be used for other family members?
wallet_balance_desc: Yes, if approved by the loan requester.
purchasing_power: Purchasing Power (Available credit for purchasing from the provider)

after_receiving_credit: 2- After receiving the credit, you must pay the service fee by selecting 'Apply for Credit'. (This fee is 1% of the total loan amount.)
note: Regarding the service fee, please note:
note_fee_amount: The service fee is non-refundable. Once paid, it cannot be returned.
note_without_paying: Without paying the service fee, the credit activated in the Bajet app cannot be used.

dont_receive_code: If you do not receive the code within the expected time, you can request a new code.
constitutes_receiving_credit: Please note that entering the OTP means the credit has been officially granted and cancelation is no longer possible.
